omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
		op.NHSNumber, 
		op.AppointmentDate,
		op.AppointmentTime,
		op.ReferralRequestReceivedDate,
		op.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
	from omop_staging.sus_OP op
	where ReferralRequestReceivedDate is not null
		and op.NHSNumber is not null
		and AttendedorDidNotAttend in ('5','6')
	order by op.NHSNumber, 
		op.AppointmentDate,
		op.AppointmentTime,
		op.ReferralRequestReceivedDate,
		op.GeneratedRecordIdentifier

omopColumns.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier

dataSource.name: GeneratedRecordIdentifier
dataSource.description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.

omopColumns.name: observation_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `40760321`. Date of Referral

omopColumns.name: observation_datetime
omopColumns.operation_description: Combines a date with a time of day.

dataSource.name: AppointmentTime
dataSource.description: The time, advised to a PATIENT for when they can expect to see a relevant CARE PROFESSIONAL at an Out-Patient Clinic.

omopColumns.name: observation_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. EHR administration record

omopColumns.name: value_as_string

dataSource.name: ReferralRequestReceivedDate
dataSource.description: The date the Referral request was received by the Health Care Provider.

omopColumns.query:
select
		op.NHSNumber, 
		op.AppointmentDate,
		op.AppointmentTime,
		op.ReferralRequestReceivedDate,
		op.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
	from omop_staging.sus_OP op
	where ReferralRequestReceivedDate is not null
		and op.NHSNumber is not null
		and AttendedorDidNotAttend in ('5','6')
	order by op.NHSNumber, 
		op.AppointmentDate,
		op.AppointmentTime,
		op.ReferralRequestReceivedDate,
		op.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
